title: Understanding Cognitive Impairment
text: Cognitive impairment can affect a child's ability to process information, learn new skills, and perform tasks independently. This can be a significant source of stress for parents.

title: Challenging Behaviors
text: Children with ASD may exhibit challenging behaviors such as aggression, self-injury, or tantrums, which can be difficult for parents to manage.

title: Language Delays
text: Language delays can make it difficult for children to communicate their needs and feelings, leading to frustration for both the child and the parent.

title: Lack of Self-Care Abilities
text: When a child requires assistance with daily living skills such as feeding, dressing, and toileting, it can increase the caregiving burden on parents.

hintAnswer: cognitive impairment, challenging behaviors, language delays, lack of $$self-care$$ abilities
title: Identifying the Struggles
text: Based on the scenario, identify the four struggles that contribute to the mother's high stress levels.
choices: cognitive impairment, challenging behaviors, language delays, lack of $$self-care$$ abilities
